parameters.content:
CLIENT ONBOARDING AUTOMATION:

Triggers on new email to onboarding address

FLOW:
1. Parse client info from inquiry email
2. Add to master client tracking sheet
3. Send professional welcome email
4. Notify team via Telegram
5. Wait 24 hours
6. Check if client responded
7. Send follow-up if still "new" status

SETUP:
1. Create dedicated email: onboarding@persimmonlabs.com
2. Set up Gmail trigger for that email
3. Create CLIENTS_MASTER_SHEET_ID
4. Add Calendly scheduling link
5. Update contact phone number

CLIENT STATUSES:
- new: Just inquired
- contacted: Had call/meeting
- setup: Workflows configured
- active: Live automation
- paused: Temporarily stopped
- cancelled: No longer client

This automates the first touchpoint and follow-up, ensuring no leads fall through cracks.
